amendment.description: To fund the Election Assistance Commission for fiscal year 2004.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1928 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1928 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 31. Record Vote Number: 409.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1928.
Amendment SA 1928 proposed by Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S13106-13112; text: CR S13106) To fund the Election Assistance Commission for fiscal year 2004.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1928 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 31. Record Vote Number: 409.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1928 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1928 proposed by Senator Dodd.
